channel.title: How to make MULTIPLE chat history colors ~PRO~ (K09 HELP)
channel.description: Im just wondering how you would make multiple chat log colors cause when I change the username default to white or blue or any color it doesnt show up on chat history.. but when I turn to yellow it works 100%... Please tell me what to change in order for it to pick up any color?

Im just wondering how you would make multiple chat log colors cause when I change the username default to white or blue or any color it doesnt show up on chat history… but when I turn to yellow it works 100%… Please tell me what to change in order for it to pick up any color?
